channel.title: Photo on Simba Tango
channel.description: Recent content in Photo on Simba Tango

item.title: Buenos Aires Street Art
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: by Simba tango I thought I’d share some photos from the streets of Buenos Aires where there you can often see the kind of graffitti made with stencils. Among the motifs I’ve encountered are tango in the incarnation of Osvaldo Pugliese and a new electrotango band called tranxgo, football icon Maradona, not so subtle drug references and lots of other stuff. [flickr-gallery mode=“photoset” photoset=“72157622958599173”]

item.title: Lluvia de abril
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: by Simba tango by Simba tango Spring is coming to the northern hemisphere, and outside our window, the magnolia is just about to burst into bloom. We had a wonderful walk in the April rain.

item.title: Gingerbread milonga
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description:
Some friends (also tango maniacs, of course) made this just before Christmas a couple of years ago. A really tasty milonga it was! Welcome to Club Grizelle!
I released the photos under a Creative Commons license, so feel free to use them for whatever non-commercial purpose you like :-) I appreciate a link and a comment if you find use for it. Maybe they can be useful for invitations to your Christmas milonga?
